fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces

Interface PositionI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface PositionI
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface PositionI defines the methods for manipulating sensor node geographical positions.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-12-08

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Direction directionFrom(PositionI p)
      return the direction in which this position is with respect to p.
      double distance(PositionI p)
      return the distance between this position and p.
      boolean eastOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is east of p.
      boolean northOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is north of p.
      boolean southOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is south of p.
      boolean westOf(PositionI p)
      return true if this position is west of p.
